body:
Hey guys,
dodgy here.

    I would just like to say that I am quitting Minecraft for ever. The reason is, is that It just got real boring. I was one interview away from getting Staff. (Assuming I passed of course) I don't know what happened. I just got real bored. I have reset my computer to factory default to get everything off. I wish everyone the best of life, and remember... life, school, family, friends comes first. Again, I wish everyone the best of luck.

Keep Swinging
- dodgy

title: Letter Of Resignation.

replies.body: I hate to see you go, you were a great friend. Good luck in life!
replies.body_tagged: I hate to see you go, you were a great friend. Good luck in life!

replies.body:
Goodbye :(
I still remember that map we made until you shut down your server and the files got corrupted xD. Enjoy your life
replies.body_tagged:
Goodbye :(
I still remember that map we made until you shut down your server and the files got corrupted xD. Enjoy your life

replies.body:
Bye dodger. It was nice knowing you, even if it was a short while.

Enjoy your life, don't let anyone waste or destroy it.
replies.body_tagged:
Bye dodger. It was nice knowing you, even if it was a short while.

Enjoy your life, don't let anyone waste or destroy it.

replies.body: gl in life, another one gone D:
replies.body_tagged: gl in life, another one gone D:

replies.body: It feels like everyone who's leaves always does something really stupid like resetting there computer or some shiz like that. I've already kinda left but I don't go doing something so I can't go back it it once in awhile.
replies.body_tagged: It feels like everyone who's leaves always does something really stupid like resetting there computer or some shiz like that. I've already kinda left but I don't go doing something so I can't go back it it once in awhile.

replies.body:
How do you set your computer to factory default? This could be my big break!!!

And sad to see you go. :( Saw you in-game sometimes, but see ya later dude.

What operating system do you have?


and bye dodger :( I only played with you when I was an avinub but i'll always remember you and miss you :(

replies.body: We never finished the water slide cri :'(........the day we first met we were in senex....

replies.body:
Farewell,
I don't really know you, but you seem nice.
Anyway, I'd like you to remember this;
Your thoughts become your words, your words become your actions, and your actions become your destiny.

Good luck :D
